description: GrowPlus is a GTPS project with unique features and gameplay.<CR>Developed by GrowPlus Community using GT3 Remake by Jar, coded in C++. Full version available via DM to GTPSHAX/Dems on Discord.
footer: Thanks for trying this app. Feel free to give feedback or suggestions; we appreciate it.
title: GrowPlus - Demo mode
updates: Free features to test server functionality before buying the full version.
